translated: Its glossy fur is the most expensive and gentler world, she came close to extinction, and 100 years ago, there were only 300 in the wild sables.
original: Sa fourrure brillante est la plus chère et la plus douce du monde, elle a frôlé l'extinction, il y à 100 ans, il ne restait que 300 zibelines à l'état sauvage.
